work.title: One hub. Many products.
work.desc: InnovaApps is the central studio where ideas launch, mature, and scale. Products start small, validate quickly, and grow into standalone brands when they’re ready.
work.hubDesc: InnovaApps is the central home where products are introduced, documented, and maintained over time.
work.growDesc: Products begin inside the studio, prove their value, and earn independence as they grow.

stack.title: A clean system for apps, plugins, and websites
stack.desc: A modern React-based UI system powers new products, while existing apps evolve and migrate over time. Shared motion, components, and structure keep everything fast, consistent, and scalable.

motionGuide.title: Polished products that feel effortless
motionGuide.desc: From idea to production, we care about how products feel, not just how they look.

principles.title: Fast by default
principles.desc: Interfaces respond instantly with clear feedback, loading states, and smooth transitions.

principles.title: Clarity over noise
principles.desc: Clean hierarchy and calm UI decisions so the product stays readable and focused.

principles.title: Real product logic
principles.desc: Built around real flows—state, validation, async updates, and edge cases that matter in production.

principles.title: Built to evolve
principles.desc: Modular structure that supports iteration, refactors, plugins, and migrations as products grow.

story.title: Built to create products that actually get used
story.desc: InnovaApps was created to build useful, well-crafted products that people actually rely on. We focus on real problems, real usage, and long-term quality, not demos or hype.
story.panelDesc: We started InnovaApps to create products we wished existed. Tools that are practical, thoughtful, and built to last. Everything here is shaped by real usage, not trends.

highlights.title: Start small
highlights.desc: Launch a plugin, landing page, or MVP quickly with a premium baseline.

highlights.title: Prove value
highlights.desc: Measure real usage and refine the product before scaling complexity.

highlights.title: Graduate winners
highlights.desc: When a product earns it, it becomes its own world with domain, billing, and roadmap.
